meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lindsay Townes Tony Langford Matt Jackson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7140.

td.p: Lindsay Townes, a Ph.D. candidate in epidemiology from Detroit, Michigan
Tony Langford, a software engineer from Roswell, Georgia
Matt Jackson, a paralegal from Washington, D.C. (whose 5-day cash winnings total $140,401)

tr.td: WRITING FOR TELEVISION
THAT'S HISTORY
TOP 10 GLOBAL BRANDS
(Alex: ...according to the 2015 Brandz list.)
"HIP" WORDS
ANIMALS IN KIDS' BOOKS
NEW SPORTS TEAM NAMES?
(Alex: They all have a geographic and a non-geographic element to them.)

[Laughter]

the Copyright Act

Matt
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Will this be one of those days when Matt Jackson, our champion, is happy that the game was a runaway for him? )
...
(Alex: [To Tony] The important word in that clue, I guess, was "fireside". Yeah, the Fireside Chats of FDR.)
TonyWho is Eleanor Roosevelt?
$3,000
LindsayWho is Eleanor Roosevelt?
$100
MattWho is Shirley Temple???
$7,000
Eleanor Roosevelt')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'U.N. delegate was one role of this woman who wrote, "I could not... be contented to take my place in a warm corner by the fireside"')

U.N. delegate was one role of this woman who wrote, "I could not... be contented to take my place in a warm corner by the fireside"
Matt
Tony
Lindsay
6-day champion: $166,401
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Matt
Tony
Lindsay

27 R
(including 3 DDs),
1 W

8 R,
4 W

6 R,
1 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
